Class GymCustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.rest.GymCustomerController
@Path("/customer") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class GymCustomerController extends Object
Controller for customer-related operations. Handles tasks such as viewing gyms, booking slots, and managing profile.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Details

    • getGyms

      @GET @Path("/gyms") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getGyms(@QueryParam("city") String city)
      Retrieves a list of gyms, optionally filtered by city.
      Parameters:
      city - the city to filter gyms (optional)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of gyms

    • searchGyms

      @GET @Path("/gyms/search") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response searchGyms(@QueryParam("name") String name)
      Searches for gyms by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name or part of the name of the gym
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of matching gyms

    • getGymDetails

      @GET @Path("/gyms/{centerId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getGymDetails(@PathParam("centerId") int centerId)
      Retrieves details of a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      Response containing the gym center details

    • getSlots

      @GET @Path("/gyms/{centerId}/slots") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSlots(@PathParam("centerId") int centerId)
      Retrieves available slots for a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the unique ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of available slots

    • bookSlot

      @POST @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response bookSlot(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @QueryParam("slotId") int slotId)
      Books a slot for the authenticated customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      slotId - the ID of the slot to book
      Returns:
      Response indicating success, waitlist status, or failure

    • cancelBooking

      @DELETE @Path("/bookings/{bookingId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response cancelBooking(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @PathParam("bookingId") int bookingId)
      Cancels an existing booking.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to cancel
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of cancellation

    • getMyBookings

      @GET @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMyBookings(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of all bookings

    • getActiveBookings

      @GET @Path("/bookings/active") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getActiveBookings(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves active bookings for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of active bookings

    • getWaitlist

      @GET @Path("/waitlist") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getWaitlist(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves current waitlist status for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing waitlist details

    • getStatistics

      @GET @Path("/statistics") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getStatistics(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves personal booking statistics for the customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing customer statistics

    • updateProfile

      @PUT @Path("/profile") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateProfile(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, GymCustomer customer)
      Updates the customer's profile details.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      customer - GymCustomer object with updated details
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of update

    • changePassword

      @POST @Path("/change-password") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response changePassword(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @QueryParam("oldPassword") String oldPassword, @QueryParam("newPassword") String newPassword)
      Changes the customer's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the customer (from header)
      oldPassword - current password
      newPassword - new password to set
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of password change
